IMAGE: Kuldeep Yadav, who claimed a match-winning haul of eight wickets in the first Test, was dropped for the second and final match in Dhaka. Photograph: BCCI/Twitter

articles.title: Erik ten Hag without six Man United players ahead of Nottingham Forest clash - Nottinghamshire Live
articles.description: Latest Nottingham Forest news from NottinghamshireLive brings you an injury update from United's camp ahead of Premier League match
articles.content:
Manchester United boss Erik ten Hag could be without up to six first-team players against Nottingham Forest on Tuesday night (8pm).
